bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to regulate capital outlay expenditures. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 4-3-30. Capital outlay expenditures--Limitation. The state may not expend more than three dollars and thirty-one cents per person in the state from the general fund on capital outlay. The number of persons in the state shall be based on the most recent population estimate from the U.S. Census Bureau.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
